.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
     
User Power Inputs
=================

**Theoretical Power** *str*

ACCERT will ask for both, a thermal and electrical power.

**Value** *float*

The value will be put after the appropriate parameters for thermal and electric.

**Unit** *str*

The unit will have to be in watts, but it is up to the user whether it is watts, kilowatts, or megawatts. (w, kw, mw)
